function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Teleworking may lead to increased sedentary behavior and a lack of physical activity, which can contribute to poor health outcomes and increase the risk of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Reduced physical activity and poor health can lead to increased susceptibility to contagious diseases, such as Covid-19.","Mitigation":"Encourage regular physical activity and provide guidance on creating a healthy workstation to mitigate the risk of sedentary behavior.","Technologies":"Health and wellness apps for tracking physical activity, ergonomic furniture for creating a comfortable and healthy workstation.","People":"Teleworkers, individuals working from home.","Owner":"Employers, health organizations, and individuals themselves."},{"Description":"Conflicts or disputes within the home environment due to teleworking can lead to increased stress and potential negative mental health outcomes, impacting the individual's immune system and overall health.","Impact":"Increased stress and negative mental health outcomes can weaken the immune system, increasing susceptibility to contagious diseases like Covid-19.","Mitigation":"Providing resources for managing stress, conflict resolution strategies, and promoting mental wellness through counseling and support services.","Technologies":"Tele-mental health platforms, stress management apps, virtual counseling services.","People":"Teleworkers, families and individuals in the home environment.","Owner":"Employers, mental health professionals, and individuals themselves."},{"Description":"Reduced air quality improvements could result from increased teleworking, if individuals do not take measures to maintain a healthy indoor environment, leading to potential health risks, including the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases and respiratory illnesses, including Covid-19.","Mitigation":"Educating individuals on indoor air quality maintenance, promoting ventilation, and using air purifiers to enhance indoor air quality.","Technologies":"Smart air quality monitors, air purifiers, ventilation systems, and educational resources on indoor air quality.","People":"Teleworkers, individuals in indoor environments.","Owner":"Health organizations, environmental agencies, and individuals themselves."}]}
